messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I am a local farmer. I've lived in the area for 6 years and have come to love the Moorlands. I believe the people of this great constituency have been failed by their councils and they've been failed by their Government. We need to stop looking to the mainstream political parties for change. We need a true alternative. That is why I am standing as UKIP's candidate. I am not a career politician, I am not funded by big corporations or Unions. I am a working class man who only wants to serve the people. I stand for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
Scrap income tax on the minimum wage, scrap the bedroom tax, and scrap the tax on your children when you die.
Pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid.
issues.economy: Scrap income tax on the minimum wage.
issues.health: Pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.immigration: FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am not a career politician, I am not funded by big corporations or Unions. I am a working class man who only wants to serve the people.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Mike Mothershaw on behalf of George Langley-Poole, Ousley cross farm, Stanton lane, Ellastone, Ashbourne DE6 2HD.

images.caption: GEORGE LANGLEY-POOLE Standing Up for Real Change
